name: Pow Pow Driving
description:
This game has been developer for the Go Godot game Jam (GoGodotJam - itch.io).

An alien race is invading earth. They are like plants growing everywhere and releasing floating monsters. Your goal is to destroy as much monsters as you can.

The browser version has been tested on Chrome and Edge (it will not work on Safari). If you experience problems while loading or playing the game in the browser version, please download the executable for your OS (available Windows, MacOS and Linux).

In the browser version click 1 time with the mouse on the screen at the beginning of the game for the mouse capture.

Controls:

Left mouse button to shoot

Keep pressing right mouse button for a better view

a/d (or mouse wheel) to move the car and avoid enemy bullets

esc to go back to main menu or pause the game

Credits:

Programmer: kamaleon70

Artist: KingdomPots

Cannon sound effect: Michel Baradar

Enemy hit sound: Mixkit

Car engine sound: qubodup

Background: Greg Zaal

Road Texture: Crack.com

Fonts: Google Fonts
